message: Mates! Is it possible to re-implement password encryption for salt usage in Django's auth?
You should check out django-bcrypt.  I know it's not exactly what you asked for, but it's the drop-dead-easiest way to get strong encryption in Django auth: https://github.com/dwaiter/django-bcrypt/
yup, it does, see django/contrib/auth/models.py , but you should be using bcrypt, as @bmelton suggests.
the django auth modelbackend already uses salts, doesn't it ?
